bazaar.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a market or area where there are a lot of small shops, especially in India or the Middle East
bazaar.translation[0].definitions[1].def: an occasion when a lot of people sell different things to collect money for a good purpose
bazaar.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a market, especially in India, North Africa, or the Middle East
bazaar.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: a bustling local market and bazaar
bazaar.translation[1].definitions[1].def: a place where things are bought and sold in a disorganized or unofficial way
bazaar.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: The free market’s arrival turned Poland’s cities into cut-price bazaars.
